name: Unwelcome Visitor
description: The Character is a warrior based character that uses powerful attack against his enemy, unwelcome alien that came one day from space, infecting the island as they passes by and creating more of them as time progress. The main character Alexa were given the order to eliminate these troublesome aliens and out for the hunt, the player were to control Alexa to battle through three level that is infected more from stages, interacting with the infected area and aliens will take damage so be cautious.
